title: Stone Fence Recipe
full_text:
Stone Fence Recipe
Close

Total
5 mins
Serves
1 cocktail

(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
ounce
applejack
1
ounce
apple brandy
1
ounce
dark rum
or
whiskey
of your choice
1
bottle
hard cider
Ice cubes
(optional)
Directions
In a 12 to 16-ounce glass, pour one ounce of applejack, apple brandy, dark rum or whiskey of your choice. Fill with hard cider; add a couple of ice cubes, if desired.
